Articles.Content:
Hola queria preguntar Si Aqui Hay Gente De suramerica que habla español queria preguntarles Eso A ver por que tengo un canal donde subo contenido de este juego que tal vez les interese podria Mostrar mis naves mis Diseños entre otros objetos pero me gustaria saber si hay Gente activa de suramerica

Traduction 

 

Hello wanted to ask if there are people from South America speak Spanish wanted to ask that to see why I have a channel where I upload content of this game that may interest you could show my bad ships Designs Among Other Objects But I would like to know if there People active suramerica

Hi @Vanishing, welcome to the forums.

You'll find a lot of Spanish speakers in the Spanish forum here.

Hope this helps
